toggle_switch.description: Toggle the switch to change the water flow.

remove_dirt_from_switch.description: Clean the switch to ensure smooth operation.

rotate_switch_to_adjust_flow.description: Rotate the switch to adjust the volume of the water flow.

rotate_switch_to_stop_flow.description: Rotate the switch to the off position to stop the water flow.

turn_on_switch.description: Rotate the switch to the open position to allow the water to flow.

turn_off_switch.description: Rotate the switch to the closed position to stop the water flow.

turn_switch.description: Turn the switch to open or close the water flow.

rotate_switch.description: Rotate the switch to adjust the water flow.

press_switch.description: Press the switch to start or stop the water flow.

wipe_base.description: Wipe the base of the faucet to maintain cleanliness.

polish_base.description: Polish the base of the faucet for shine.

swipe_faucet_base.description: Swipe the base of the faucet to remove any water drops or dirt.

clean_faucet_base.description: Clean the faucet base to maintain its cleanliness and shine.

polish_faucet_base.description: Wipe the base of the faucet to keep it shiny and clean.

wipe_faucet_base.description: Wipe the faucet base to keep it clean.

use_faucet.description: Toggle the switch to use the faucet and then clean it after use.

maintain_faucet.description: Wipe the faucet base and switch to maintain cleanliness, then toggle the switch to check its functioning.

operational_check.description: Toggle the switch to check its operational condition.

overall_cleaning.description: Clean the entire faucet including the switch and base, for maintaining hygiene.

regular_maintenance.description: Regularly toggle the switch to check its functioning and wipe the faucet base to maintain cleanliness.

full_maintenance.description: Perform a total cleaning and functionality check by cleaning the switch and base and toggling the switch.

standard_operation.description: Toggle the switch to use the faucet and then clean base after operation.

complete_faucet_operation_and_cleaning.description: Clean the switch and base, toggle the switch for operation, and then clean the base after use.

operate_faucet.description: Rotate the switch to start the water flow.

use_and_clean_faucet.description: Rotate the switch to use the faucet and then clean the faucet base.

clean_and_operate_faucet.description: Clean the faucet base, then rotate the switch to use the faucet.

single_operation.description: Turn on the switch and let the water flow.

full_operation.description: Switch on the faucet, let the water flow, then close it after use.

clean_faucet.description: Clean the entire faucet including switch and faucet base.

operate_and_clean_faucet.description: Turn the switch for operation and clean the whole faucet.

clean_whole_faucet.description: Clean the entire faucet including switch and base.

operate_and_clean.description: Press the switch, rotate it and clean the whole faucet
